name: Seong-Whan Lee
content: 고려대학교 패턴인식 및 머신러닝 연구실 NEWS PEOPLE Professor Postdoctoral Fellows Graduate Students Alumni RESEARCH ADAS Brain-Computer Interface Computer Vision Artificial General Intelligence Large Language Model Speech Processing PUBLICATIONS GALLERY ARCHIVE CONTACT US Recent Publications 2025 Nov., "Towards Memory-Efficient Continual Adaptation for MI-EEG Decoding in BCIs" has been accepted in IEEE Trans. on Systems, Man and Cybernetics: Systems. 2025 Oct., "Enhancing Spatio-Temporal Zero-shot Action Recognition with Language-driven Description Attributes" has been accepted in Pattern Recognition. 2025 Oct., "Consciousness-ECG Transformer for Conscious State Estimation System with Real-Time Monitoring" has been accepted in Expert Systems With Applications. 2025 Oct., "Reconstructing Unseen Sentences from Speech-related Biosignals for Open-vocabulary Neural Communication" has been accepted in IEEE Trans. on Neural Systems & Rehabilitation Engineering. 2025 Sep., "Towards Generalizable 3D Human Pose Estimation via Ensembles on Flat Loss Landscapes" has been accepted in NeurIPS. 2025 Aug., "XLQA: A Benchmark for Locale-Aware Multilingual Open-Domain Question Answering" has been accepted in EMNLP. 2025 Aug., "FillerSpeech: Towards Human-Like Text-to-Speech Synthesis with Filler Injection and Filler Style Control," has been accepted in EMNLP. 2025 Jul., "ChemFixer: Correcting Invalid Molecules to Unlock Previously Unseen Chemical Space" has been accepted in IEEE Journal of Biomedical and Health Informatics. 2025 Jul., "MIRe: Enhancing Multimodal Queries Representation via Fusion-Free Modality Interaction for Multimodal Retrieval" has been accepted in Findings of ACL. 2025 Jul., "RaDL: Relation-aware Disentangled Learning for Multi-Instance Text-to-Image Generation" has been accepted in IEEE SMC.
